'''''Yon Mirror'd Moon, Broken''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Teyvat Fishing Guide: Series I]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to catch a fish that only comes out at night for the first time.

==Gameplay Notes==
*Night takes place from 18:00 – 06:00 in-game. The type of fish that only appear at night can be found organized by fishing point at [[Fishing/Fishing Points|Fishing Points]].
